name: Box Catcher
description:
In this box catching game, when the time runs out, make sure you have only 1 box detected by your 'ship'. You can stack if you want, but beware -there are several types of boxes, and the more you catch, the harder it is to move. Enjoy!

Credits: 

Music: Section 31 -Tech (http://s31tech.org)

Skybox: Adam Bielecki theadambielecki@Gmail.com
